Game is unplayable after the patch, fix the hiboxes :)

the game is quite interesting and addictive, at the same time it immerses you in everything that happens in it. it can keep you in it for many hours, and you will not even notice how quickly they fly by, in 4 years I played 1k hours and more than half of the hours passed by me in the first year and a half, the problem with this game is that only 4-5 years ago the game was really scary for newbies, it was very interesting and you were intimidated. now the game is no longer similar to the horror genre, and is losing ground in comparison with the one that was 4 years ago, now it is completely different. bhvr for some reason constantly either repairs maniacs or survivors, survivors no longer have the speed they are used to, but you can start all generators in a very short time, which makes the game very difficult for maniacs and when you are fighting team, you either replay them in class (but it will be difficult to do), or at the end of the game you camp for 1-2 survivors. earlier in the game it was not possible to start 5 generators in 5 minutes, but it was necessary to spend more time, and the game speed was much higher, and the chases were exciting than now, I hope that bhvr will think that there is something happening with the game and start working over the game, not constantly releasing new additions, and not because they need money to make the game better, but to get money and release the weakest maniac and useless survivor again.
Waiting in Lobby simulator if you're killer. Had 3 survivors and myself waiting for about 10 minutes before they started leaving. Great game. NOT

180+ hours into this game and I've come to realize that the developers are blind. They continously buff killers because the best survivors in the world are able to run them very easy; leaving everyone else completely screwed. In the end this game is just a pretend survival horror that ends up being more like an episode of Benny Hill.

Ich spiele dieses Spiel schon sehr lange, doch statt verbesserung kommen nach meiner persÃ¶hnlichen meinung eher Verschlechterung. Die ErklÃ¤hrung ist einfach, als Spieler von Dead by Daylight wird man quasi gewollt unter druck gesetzt, damit man es immer lange am stÃ¼ck spielt, und dazu zÃ¤hlen unter anderen auch die Neuerungen. Denn als gelegenheitsspieler kriegt man hier nur Arschtritte z.b warum kann mich der Killer aufeinmal sehen ? RIP warum tÃ¶tet er mich ohne mich auf den Haken zu hÃ¤ngen ? RIP. Alle diese sachen kann man nur verstehen wenn man das Spiel regelmÃ¤ÃŸig spielt. Wenn man das Spiel jetzt RegelmÃ¤ÃŸig spielt und man immer auf den laufenden ist, kommt sogar spielspaÃŸ auf. Dies endet jedoch wenn der Killer dich auf den Haken hÃ¤ngt, und dir dort ins gesicht guckt bis du am Haken das Zeitliche Segnest. Und der SpaÃŸ vergeht auch bei Leuten die einfach bei jeder Kleinigkeit das Spiel verlassen, was die Ã¼berlebenschancen der anderen stark reduziert. Die eben genannten Probleme die wirklich sehr viel vom SpielspaÃŸ wegnehmen, kann man vermehrt auch in Rewiews von 2017 beobachten, jedoch ohne eine Sichtbare entwiklung. Das liegt daran das die Entwickler dieses Spiels (Behaviour Digital Inc) Das Support Team seit einiger Zeit beurlaubt haben. Und das betrifft nicht nur das Report System welches dadurch Ã¼berflÃ¼ssig ist, sondern auch den Support wenn das Spiel nicht funktioniert. Denn bei mir war es vor einiger Zeit gewesen, das mein Spiel andauert abgestÃ¼rzt ist und die entwickler haben mir einfach nicht geholfen und ich konnte das Spiel ein halbes Jahr lang nicht spielen. Das tat meiner Psyche vieleicht ganz gut ;) jedoch ist es schon traurig wenn Entwickler ein DLC nach den anderen auf den Markt bringen, es aber nicht hinkriegen unfaire mitspieler der Community zu bestrafen, Bugs zu beheben oder das Halloween Special viel spÃ¤ter online bringen als geplant. Mein Fazit ist folgendes .: gehÃ¶rt ihr zu den Gamern die ein Spiel lange am StÃ¼ck spielen, dann wird auch SpaÃŸ aufkommen. GehÃ¶rt ihr aber zu den Spielern die sich nur ab und zu mit Computerspielen auseinandersetzen, dann seid ihr hier verkehrt. Dem spiel selbst wÃ¼rde ich eine gute bewertung geben, doch da man es nur online spielen kann und die Entwickler einfach um nichts kÃ¼mmern, muss ich hier leider eine Negative bewertung abgeben.

JOGO FULL PRA QUEM TEM DLC E SO JOGA DE KILLER JOGO DE FDP

The game itself is really fun, but people (survive with friends groups) tend to use things that can be quite annoying to aggravate the killer, and the game doesn't have a lot of immersion that way, like bodyblocking the killer or hooks.
The main problem lies in the Survive with Friends mode, where people can play together, but they tend to give information that can't be given through normal survival, due to voice chat.

The community is very toxic, even worse than League of Legends' community, so, don't stay in the post-game lobby
I recommend finding a friendly group and going into some casual custom games if you can!

All in all I'd say the game is fun as survivor, but as killer it can be very frustrating, and thus I do not recommend this game in its current state

I think we did a pretty good job so far!

not bad but it takes forever to get into a match if you are playing killer.  Lots of ways to tailor your character and every level of your bloodweb has atleast 1 useful item.  

One major downside is the community.  It is more toxic than a game of CoD filled with 7 year olds.  If you have a laggy game as killer and win, you are called a hacker and reported.  If you have a quick victory as killer, you are called a hacker and reported if the players even stay but most rage quit to keep from losing rank.  If you are playing survivor and get generators repaired too fast, the killer quits so he doesn't lose rank.  In short, its really rare that you find a good game full of people who don't cry about losing.  

I'd still suggest it to players looking for a better version of Friday the 13th that won't go into perma stasis mode any time soon.
matches are almost impossible to join, i enjoyed the game on playstation but on PC the communiy is trash and not worth the money. matchmaking is a nightmare. save your money.

I just purchased it and after searching the internet to find a cure for the stupid EAC error code 4 message, I "fixed" it... I can queue as a survivor.  But when I queue as a killer the game is all "NO BOI YOU AINT KILLIN NOBODY TODAY!" what i mean by this is that I legitimatly cannot find any survivors. This means one of two things.... EITHER the game is totally dead on pc but is POPPIN (as of today 8/10/2018) orrrr my game is just for lack of better words screwed. I unfortunaly will be requesting a refund. I do hope the devs dont quit the game. I for one will still be playing on ps4 :) anyways to all that the game works for happy hunting and.... HAPPY SURVIVING!

after hitting 100 hours on this game and bought every single dlc so far. i am very confident to say that this is an amazin game. i truly recommend it. wether you prefer hunting or getting hunted or a little bit of both (like me) this game just never gets boring as no match is the same. and if you get some friends to play with you its even more fun. one thing id like to see in the future is rewards for your rank at the end of the season. after almost another 100 hours im sick and tired of this game, killers facecamping cause you use flashlight or hookrush its becoming ridiculous, dont buy this game the community isnt what it used to be
